UAObjectType.Description: Protocol type for common wired networks
Protocol type for common wireless networks
Used for connection points on LAN networks
Used for connection point on WLAN networks
Created for instantiation of Network devices
Created for instantiation of Network devices
Element defined for instantiation of transport systems on the paint mixer

UAObject.Description: Folder maintaining the set of (sub-types of) BaseObjectTypes that can be instantiated in the ConfigurableComponent

UAObjectType.Description: The brain of the top-level devices, the one who holds the logic. Instantiated just to define where the server is installed, all the services and variables are shown on the top-level device
Representación de humano encargado de transportar hacia las estaciones de mezclado.
Element defined for instantiation of mixing systems on the paint mixer

UAObject.Description: Folder maintaining the set of (sub-types of) BaseObjectTypes that can be instantiated in the ConfigurableComponent
Folder maintaining the set of (sub-types of) BaseObjectTypes that can be instantiated in the ConfigurableComponent

UAVariable.Description: Identifier that uniquely identifies, within a manufacturer, a device instance
An incremental counter indicating the number of times the static data within the Device has been modified
Name of the company that manufactured the device
Model name of the device
Address (pathname in the file system or a URL | Web address) of user manual for the device

Value.String: Inicie sesión en la página web para recibir instrucciones.

UAVariable.Description: Overall revision level of the device
Revision level of the software/firmware of the device
Revision level of the hardware of the device
Indicates in which domain or for what purpose a device is used.
Status of a device as defined by NAMUR Recommendation NE107.

UAObject.Description: Used to organize parameters for identification of this TopologyElement
Organizes images that are used within UIElements.
Used to organize parameters for regarding services

UAVariable.Description: List of services offered by this device.
List of services that cannot be performed due to maintenance or request.
This value decreases each time the device executes an action.
ID of the product being attended by the machine. 0 Means no product is being attended.
Mixer target.
ActionToPerform.

UAObject.Description: Service to request transportation for a product. Inputs are the required service (or the variables used to calculate it), or product ID (which will lead to a db search where those variables can be obtained). After it determines where the product should go, it must display on screen so the HumanoTransportador can see it.
Service to request transportation for a processed product. Inputs are the mixer.

UAObject.Description: It waits for the transport system to elevate the painting, then, it rotates the motor forward and backwards to create an alternating mixing (Like when you mix the chocolate).

UAObject.Description: Turn on/off the motor. Inputs are direction, on/off, and if the motor is capable, speed.

UAVariable.Description: Duty %
If TRUE, the vector defining the torque of the motor is pointing outwards.
If TRUE, the motor is working right now.

UAObject.Description: It waits for the transport system to elevate the painting, then, it rotates the motor forward and backwards to create an alternating mixing (Like when you mix the chocolate).
Same as Mixing, but this offers speed control.
